articles.title: China's economy had a good first quarter. Lockdowns leave it 'in distress' - CNN
articles.description: China's economy made a solid start to the year, recording first quarter growth that surpassed expectations. But a recent slump in consumer spending and rising unemployment suggest much tougher months ahead with dozens of cities still under Covid lockdowns.
